MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA4 postcode area of Warrington, affecting properties in Chester Road, Walton Lea Road and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required to reconnect a grounded overhead cable and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:00PM on 12th February 2021.
